text:
@rexxurection @realDonaldTrump I wish I didn’t have to celebrate #mothersday2020 over a Zoom call

With 80,000 Americans dead, it’s the right thing to do

The right thing thing for a president to do would be to work on finding a cure

But Trump thinks settling political vendettas is more important

#COVID19 https://t.co/rXmRI7r0cE
